nodes.title: Standardbred Mobile - Framework Selection Process - Part 2
nodes.excerpt: If you made it through  part 1  (I'm aware it's been forever since then; but this has been drafted, just never released) you'll remember…
nodes.description: Continuing along the path to developing and releasing Standardbred Canada's mobile app, part 2 documents the initial creation and some of the best practices/libraries that were chosen to help along the way.

nodes.title: Standardbred Mobile - Framework Selection Process - Part 1
nodes.excerpt: My company recently released an Android and IOS app for our members to scan microchip data from their horses. Our US counterparts released…
nodes.description: Tasked with designing and developing Standardbred Canada's microchip scanning app; I wanted to document the process from selecting the appropriate framework to completing development and publishing the application(s).
